text_block_list.text:
……Something seems a little off…… the placement 
of the nose……? Was it a little higher……?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober

text_block_list.text:
In a corner of the library, Mejiro Dober was 
lost in thought. She had a serious expression 
and was single-mindedly drawing something.
……No, I probably have to start over to fix this.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober

text_block_list.text: Guess I'll erase it for now………… Ah!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober

text_block_list.text:
She moved her hand in wide strokes as she vigorously used an 
eraser. When she went to brush away the bits of eraser, she 
accidentally knocked over the stationery on her desk.
Aaaah man, I really did it now……
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober

text_block_list.text:
To help her, I reached down to pick up the notebook she dropped. 
The page it was open to had an Anime Character drawn on it.

It was from a long-running anime aimed at younger kids called 
『Veggie Carolyn』. Maybe she was just practicing, but there were a 
lot of pictures of the main character, Carolyn.
choice_data_list: I'll leave this on the desk
I'll leave this on the desk

text_block_list.text: Ah…… Trainer. ……Thanks.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober

text_block_list.text:
Ah…… so it was Trainer. 
Thanks for picking it up for me.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober

text_block_list.text: Wai-……don't look at it without permission!!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober

text_block_list.text: No way…… y-you saw it……?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober

text_block_list.text:
In a panic, I pointed out that it 
just happened to be on that page.

In a panic, I pointed out that it 
just happened to be on that page.
……you probably think it looks terrible, don't you!?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober

text_block_list.text:
It doesn't look like her right?…… 
Even I think it doesn't.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober

text_block_list.text:
All of the characters she drew had a bright light in 
their eyes, as if they were hopeful for the future.

All of the characters she drew had a bright light in 
their eyes, as if they were hopeful for the future.

I told her their smiles were bright and full of life, 
and their eyelashes were quite fashionable.
Is that……praise? Are you messing with me?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober

text_block_list.text:
Oh come on…… Isn't that too much praise? 
But the way you can find the good points makes me happy though.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober

text_block_list.text:
My art style……is kind of distinct, it's very shoujo manga-like. 
I already know it doesn't look like her.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober

text_block_list.text:
My art style……is very shoujo manga-like, isn't it? The things you 
praised, they're very distinct aren't they……?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober

text_block_list.text: ……you don't need to say that!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober

text_block_list.text: T-that's embarrassing!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober

text_block_list.text: ……Please keep quiet in the Library.
text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A

text_block_list.text: ……Please keep quiet in the Library.
text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A

text_block_list.text:
See?…… They got mad at us. Let's leave, Trainer. 
It's almost time for training, isn't it?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober

text_block_list.text:
On the way to the trainers' room, I asked 
her a question that had been bothering me.
Not particularly…… I watched it when I was little.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
choice_data_list: <size=41>You were drawing it as practice though?</size>
<size=38>Weren't you drawing it as practice though?</size>

text_block_list.text:
I wouldn't say I liked it……but when I was little I watched it 
often. Since you recognized the characters, it was probably the 
same for you, right?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
choice_data_list: <size=41>You were drawing it as practice though?</size>
<size=38>Weren't you drawing it as practice though?</size>

text_block_list.text:
I just happened to come across it. 
……and I like drawing.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober

text_block_list.text:
I'm used to drawing her. When it comes to drawing her, I'd say I 
like it…… I wouldn't say I was practicing drawing her though.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober

text_block_list.text: That it happened to be that anime is a coincidence!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober

text_block_list.text:
I just happened to see the anime again 
recently, so it left an impression.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober

text_block_list.text:
Mejiro Dober said all that, but her expression 
when she was drawing was serious……almost desperate.

Mejiro Dober said all that, but her expression 
when she was drawing was serious……almost desperate.

Her expression almost made it seem like she had to draw, 
even though I was sure she was just doing it for practice……

But, things can't keep going on like this…… it'll just turn 
in to a repeat of that last mock race, even I understand that.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober

text_block_list.text:
But, things can't keep going on like this…… it'll just turn 
in to a repeat of that last mock race, even I understand that.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober

text_block_list.text:
……That's why, speaking with you, is a kind of 
mental training! As the sub-trainer, hearing 
me out is part of your obligations, right?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober

text_block_list.text:
That's why…… even if it's a little bit at a time. Just like 
this, speaking to someone I'm not familiar with, might help me 
mentally…… can you help me with that?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober

text_block_list.text:
Because of her fear of strangers, it probably 
made it difficult for her to confide in others.
choice_data_list: <size=40>If something's troubling you, I'll help out</size>
<size=40>If something's troubling you, I'll help out</size>

text_block_list.text:
Because of her fear of strangers, it probably 
made it difficult for her to confide in others.
choice_data_list: <size=40>If something's troubling you, I'll help out</size>
<size=40>If something's troubling you, I'll help out</size>

text_block_list.text:
Eh……? ……Ah……Okay. 
I'll keep that in mind, just in case……
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober

text_block_list.text:
Eh……? Ah…… thank you. Yeah, well, if I'm 
ever troubled……in that case I'll ask you.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober

text_block_list.text:
However, even if only a few words were exchanged, 
I got the feeling that we both understood what the 
other was thinking, like we were used to it―

However, even if only a few words were exchanged, 
I got the feeling that we both understood what the 
other was thinking, like we were used to it―
